name: Tui Belgium N.V.
goal:
Tui Belgium is an integrated tour operating group including the activities of tour operating, airline en travel agencies.
We organize each year the holidays of more than 2 million customers.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Travel and airline specific matter such as EU261/2004, Package Travel directive, airline regulatory framework
